Author: get_lizzy
Text: Thanks, this really helped. It's so annoying because it wasn't even a binge but a normal bloody meal! It's just that feeling of feeling a little too full :/

Author: SpaceWhale88
Text: Heres what I do when I get the urge. DISTRACT.  Fo for a walk. Get away from a toilet. Call someone to chat and wish them a happy Thanksgiving. Watch pimple popping videos on YouTube. Remind yourself your body needs food to live. Ya a binge is bad, but purgingis worse.   Put it off. Say I can purge but first I have to sweep the floors, put a load of laundry in, call someone. The more often I do these things the urge lasts a shorter time. I've been where the urge last for hours but sometime now it's only 15 minutes I have to get through.
